feed.title: Steif Lab
feed.subtitle: Dr. Adi Steif's research concentrates on utilizing computational methods to analyze high-throughput genomics data, primarily within cancer research, to understand disease mechanisms and evolution. By leveraging new measurement technologies, particularly at the single-cell level, and employing statistical machine learning techniques, the Steif Lab collaborates with experimentalists to extract biological insights from complex datasets, overcoming challenges such as noise and measurement bias.

entry.title: Hello world
entry.content: Welcome to our lab website! We’re a bioinformatic lab at UBC, studying single cell sequencing. Stay tuned for regular updates and news on our latest discoveries and activities!
